item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across Indian equities, as 4,085 companies declared results reflecting a modest improvement in profitability and sales growth. While the overall proportion of companies reporting positive results rose slightly to 46.0%, sectoral and market capitalisation segments displayed divergent trends, underscoring the varied pace of recovery and operational performance across industries and company sizes. Time: Feb 24 2026 09:00 PM IST

item.title: Latent View Analytics Ltd Forms Death Cross Signalling Bearish Trend
item.description: Latent View Analytics Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting deteriorating momentum and raising concerns about the stock’s long-term strength amid ongoing sector challenges. Time: Feb 24 2026 06:45 PM IST

item.title: Authum Investment & Infrastructure Ltd Forms Death Cross Signalling Bearish Trend
item.description: Authum Investment & Infrastructure Ltd, a prominent player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average (DMA) crosses below the 200-DMA. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, raising concerns about the stock's medium to long-term momentum and investor sentiment. Time: Feb 24 2026 06:45 PM IST

item.title: Triveni Engineering and Industries Ltd Forms Golden Cross, Signalling Potential Bullish Breakout
item.description: Triveni Engineering and Industries Ltd has recently formed a Golden Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses above the 200-day moving average. This development suggests a potential bullish breakout and a shift in long-term momentum for the sugar sector company, which has seen mixed performance against the broader market over the past year. Time: Feb 24 2026 06:45 PM IST

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Show Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has concluded with 4,082 companies reporting results, revealing a nuanced picture of corporate performance across market capitalisations. While the proportion of companies delivering positive results has inched up slightly to 46.0%, sectoral and size-based disparities remain evident, underscoring the varied pace of recovery and growth across the Indian equity landscape. Time: Feb 24 2026 06:00 PM IST

item.title: Network People Services Technologies Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs 1082
item.description: Network People Services Technologies Ltd has reached a new 52-week low, closing at Rs.1082, marking a significant decline amid broader sectoral and market pressures. The stock’s recent performance reflects a combination of valuation concerns and subdued profit trends over the past year. Time: Feb 24 2026 04:06 PM IST
